Toronto Basement Waterproofing FAQs

Why choose local Toronto contractors?

Local Toronto contractors offer superior value: faster response times, intimate knowledge of Toronto soil and climate conditions, established relationships with City of Toronto, community accountability, no travel charges, and ongoing local presence for warranty service.

How long does waterproofing take in Toronto?

Interior systems typically take 2-3 days, while exterior systems take 5-10 days (weather permitting). Toronto projects often complete faster due to our local supplier relationships and familiarity with city permit processes.

Do you work during Toronto winters?

Yes! Interior waterproofing works year-round regardless of weather. For exterior work, we use heated enclosures and winter-grade materials. Emergency service is available 24/7 regardless of weather conditions.

What warranty do you provide?

We provide lifetime material warranty, 25-year labor warranty, transferable coverage for home sales, annual inspections, 24/7 emergency support, and guaranteed local Toronto service throughout the warranty period.
